alert.note: Alert for Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 4:46AM PST until December 12 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM PST MONDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Wallowa County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
